nodes.documentation:
@title TokenEscrow
@dev Holds tokens destinated to a payee until they withdraw them.
The contract that uses the TokenEscrow as its payment method
should be its owner, and provide public methods redirecting
to the TokenEscrow's deposit and withdraw.
Moreover, the TokenEscrow should also be allowed to transfer
tokens from the payer to itself.
nodes.name: TokenEscrow
deposit

nodes.documentation:
@dev Withdraw accumulated tokens for a payee.
@param _payee The address whose tokens will be withdrawn and transferred to.
nodes.name: withdraw

devdoc.details: Holds tokens destinated to a payee until they withdraw them. The contract that uses the TokenEscrow as its payment method should be its owner, and provide public methods redirecting to the TokenEscrow's deposit and withdraw. Moreover, the TokenEscrow should also be allowed to transfer tokens from the payer to itself.

deposit(address,uint256).details: Puts in escrow a certain amount of tokens as credit to be withdrawn.

params._amount: The amount of tokens to deposit in escrow.
params._payee: The destination address of the tokens.

transferPrimary(address).details: Transfers contract to a new primary.

withdraw(address).details: Withdraw accumulated tokens for a payee.

params._payee: The address whose tokens will be withdrawn and transferred to.

devdoc.title: TokenEscrow
